meanings: (머리에 얹다) place[put] sth on the head

vlive.korean: 아무튼 그런 해프닝이 이었죠. Anyway, there was that incident. 듣기 View video NCT : Stop,💚Stop. Baby Don't Stop💚
맞아요 제 필통이랑 동전 지갑이랑 옛날 핸드폰 케이스랑 다 알린이었죠. - 맞아요. Right, pencil case, coin purse, and my old cell phone case was all Alien. - Right. 듣기 View video GOT YA! 공원소녀 : [GWSN V] GOT YA! 공원소녀 본방사수 완료 V LIVE #09

vlive.korean: 남녀공학 이었죠? - 네. 남녀공학 이었어요. Was it a mixed school? - Yes. It was a mixed school. 듣기 View video KIM TAE WOO : 김태우의 10주년 '하고 싶은 말' (KIM TAE WOO 10th Anniv. ‘Words I'd Want To Say’)

vlive.korean: 거의 하루종일 이었죠. 'REALLY REALLY' 찍을 때 하루종일 찍었잖아요. Almost all day. We shot "REALLY REALLY" mv all day. 듣기 View video WINNER : [REPLYA] WINNER 'FATE NUMBER FOR' COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: Almost all day. We shot "REALLY REALLY" mv all day.

vlive.korean: 제가 다 같이 예기했을 때... 올해가 2016년 이었죠? - 네. When I talked about it with everyone... It was 2016, right? - Yes. 듣기 View video B.A.P : B.A.P - 2016 Christmas Message
vlive.english: When I talked about it with everyone... It was 2016, right? - Yes.

examples.korean: "Who told you you’re a piano player?" The engineers cringed, quietly shut down the equipment as T. A. continued, "You’re a pounder, that’s what you are, a pounder!" 듣기 Add to Wordbook "당신 보고 누가 피아노 연주자라고 했습니까?" 엔지니어들은 움츠렸고 조용히 기기들을 끄기도 했죠. 제작자 T. A.는 말을 이었죠. "당신은 그냥 쿵쾅대는 사람이에요. 그게 당신입니다!" EDU TIMES
